title: Get Two Rune Pages for the Price of One

replies.body: That's actually pretty cool, if I blur my vision it looks exactly like Ralph.
Yaaay.... Rito removed my pixel art. {{champion:32}}

Really? O.o
I hope they don't start removing my stories =/

Oh man, if they started removing your stories there would be no point to post sales for us to look at online. You guys are like icons. I come to read Moriuz stories and recently have been looking for Noedig's pixel art. Rito plz.
Are they really removing them!? Cause #1 I think it's retarded that they are! and #2 Why the hell do they let the idiot that put the 120 {{champion:119}} pictures keep his?!
I hate to say this, but you can never have enough Draven.
Zoom out with STRG+Mousewheel, it gets better every tick.
Crtl - or Ctrl + is are the keystrokes for zoom in/out. (For reference)
Or Cmd... 
{{champion:254}} : GET REKT!!!
there should be a champ who resembles that
Wreck it Mundo Skin!!!!!!
WHY DID YOU DELETE?

I didn't.
Rito did it. :c
what was it?

It was Wreck-It Ralph...
Emphasize WAS.
They probably scrapped it because Wreck it Ralph is a copyrighted character or some legal business like that. 's a shame, I never got to see it D:
{{champion:201}} has still not bean released!{{item:3175}}
D: It was deleted before I got to see your epic work.
Was the Wreck-it-Ralph offending anybody?

{{champion:75}} Wow
    Many Runes
So Value
  Wow
Based Rito

That moment when you have 6 rune pages and enough RP for the ~~7~~ 14 rune-page bundle.

Logged in to downvote.
Sick of this community and their stupid memes.
Rude and unnecessary.
I don't think the bundle will be 2 for 1.
Well that would suck, I don't see why not though.  I would be willing to buy multiple rune pages for half off, and since I need 14, that magic number of 7 would be a wonderful bundle to put on sale.
Just buy the 1 page during the 2 for 1 sale 4 times for a total of 8 pages, and it costs less than the 7 page bundle does when it's on sale.
But he needs 14 to have exactly 20.  Buying four 2 for 1s don't make 14 rune pages.
*Very runes. Your name is Doge King, yet you don't even know doge grammar. C'mon, man.
For two years I've been using one Rune Page for Attack damage and one for Ability Power. Once I buy these two, I don't really know what I'll do with them xD

I think you'll find numerous rune pages will really help out in certain matchups... {{summoner:2}} 
Not to mention if you ever have to support, haha...
tell me about it. i main support and i only have the two pages, so i don't have any for specific other roles

That's how I was doing things until the last 2 for 1 sale. Now I'm running 4 pages, and am anxious to grab some more once the next sale hits. I figure 6 pages will be fine, but I'll probably bump my total up to 8 to be on the safe side. Who knows when the next sale will be? Might as well have them and not need them than need them and not have them.

Filling up the extras will take some time, too, since runes are expensive (and because I didn't buy any when they were on sale).
ive been doing the same thing.... i see the value in more rune pages but ive outfitted mine to cover all the champs i play.....
I read it as Rumble/teemo/Cass, before I realized Badger/Mushroom/Snake. Derp.
Oh god I feel ancient....
Don't worry, people like us are still out there, hiding, waiting for the day we are able to once again claim the internet!
http://www.albinoblacksheep.com/flash/badgers For all who don't understand.
i dont get what this is?

Awesome!!! Can't wait!!!

PS - you have a type-o, you need a space after 2 for 1 Rune Pages item (it's currently itemin)
Rito pls... {{champion:1}} spelling errors take away from the {{summoner:13}} of your message.
If you get the 7 Rune Page Bundle (2600 RP) do you get 14 rune pages?
Just buy 1 page 4 times during the 2 for 1, and you'll get 8 rune pages for 2360 RP.

you can stop posting this repeatedly to people asking for it.  They clearly want 14 rune pages for the price of seven.  So how does telling them they can get 8 (which was obvious anyway) constitute any type of solution to their question?
Slaven is actually giving good advice. Stop hating

He's actually not. 8 rune pages for 2360 is nowhere close to the 14 rune pages for 2600. Buying in bulk is almost always cheaper than buying smaller amounts. The 7 rune page bundle is cheaper than buying 7 single rune pages so telling people to buy a bunch of 2 for 1 single rune pages is not a solution to wanting the 7 page bundle to be 2 for 1.
I could've swore that they'd announced that it'd last two weeks... Oh well.
It is 2 weeks :P 23-29 and 30-6

Yeah. They did originally say it would be a two week long sale. I don't know why it's only lasting 1 week... =\ But I am glad they gave people a heads up so people can grind up IP after the rune sale, and now another head's up for what days the sale will be in a few weeks.
